Gettext Sources Files (PO/POT)
Create, edit and share with WIKINDX users your bibliographic and citation styles.

MySQL backup database tools. This tool is limited by the maximum execution time of a web page of your hosting service. It can not replace an appropriate backup tool for large databases like mysqldump. This plugin can be a security vulnerability for a public site. Use with caution.
Display a drop-down menu on all pages to choose the language of the interface. This is useful if your website is hosted on the web and on public access.
Embedded version of the database manager Adminer, with a selection of tested plugins. This plugin can be a security vulnerability for a public site. Use with caution.
Some tools for debugging Wikindx. For developers, testers, or difficult situations when a bug arises.
Import a resource from Amazon using Amazon's web services (imports only books). You must have a personal Amazon developer account to query the web service.
Import and export bibliographies in various formats (Bibtex, EndNote, HTML, PubMed, RIS, RTF).
Customize the description on the home page in various languages.
Attempt to fix to a number of errors that can occur over time in the database. For developers, testers, or difficult situations when a db schema is corrupted.
Experimental plugin that plays sounds at certain Wikindx events.
User administration of categories.
Create various graphical visualizations from WIKINDX data with the JpGraph PHP library.
Logged in users can use a WYSIWYG word processor for the writing of articles.
Associação Brasileira de Normas Técnicas (ABNT)

American Psychological Association (APA) (installed by default). APA is an author/date based style. This means emphasis is placed on the author and the date of a piece of work to uniquely identify it.
British Medical Journal (BMJ)
Comicforschung-Bibliographie Stil (CFB)
Chicago Style. Turabian and Chicago are two separate styles but are very similar, just like Harvard and APA. These are widely used for history and economics.
Harvard Style. Harvard is very similar to APA. Where APA is primarily used in the USA, Harvard referencing is widely used in the UK and Australia and is encouraged for use with the humanities.
Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE), a widely accepted format for writing research papers, commonly used in technical fields, particularly in computer science.
Modern Language Association (MLA). MLA is most often applied by the arts and humanities, particularly in the USA. It is arguably the most well used of all of the citation styles.
Turabian Style. Turabian and Chicago are two separate styles but are very similar, just like Harvard and APA. These are widely used for history and economics.
Wikindx Style
A green basic theme that talks about mosses (horizontal menu)
A colorful theme (horizontal menu)
Wikindx default theme (installed by default, horizontal menu)
A theme around the medieval manuscript Liber Floridus (vertical menu)
Theme of the Portail International Archivistique Francophone (PIAF) (horizontal menu)
A blue basic theme (horizontal menu)
An orange basic theme (vertical menu)

jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API that works across a multitude of browsers. With a combination of versatility and extensibility, jQuery has changed the way that millions of people write JavaScript.
JSON library in JavaScript.
This package contains a copy of each license used by Wikindx or third-party software on which it depends.
The PdfToText class has been designed to extract textual contents from a PDF file.
A full-featured email creation and transfer class for PHP.
Responsive and slick progress bars with animated SVG paths.
Smarty is a template engine for PHP, facilitating the separation of presentation (HTML/CSS) from application logic.
